import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search issue types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches issue types using a request-body filter. Use this when you need to constrain the list by scope, site, or other criteria supported by `GetIssueTypesRequest`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build a `GetIssueTypesRequest` with the desired filters.
2. Submit the search: [POST /api/v1.0/issues/types](/docs/api/issues/search-issue-types).
3. Use returned `Items[]` to drive issue type selection or validation.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None. Filters are optional.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"SiteScope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site","Personal","GlobalOnly","Aggregate"],"default":"Aggregate"},"ApplySiteVisibility":{"type":"boolean","default":true},"IgnoreSiteIdFilter":{"type":"boolean"},"IgnoreProductIdFilter":{"type":"boolean"},"AppIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"nullable":true}},"example":{"SiteScope":"Aggregate","ApplySiteVisibility":true},"title":"GetIssueTypesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
